text:
cont. from below.... If only for the same reasons I did, to see what Elena Fisher was like in real life. I absolutely love it and would really, REALLY, hate to see it go. Check out it's imdb page for more info. Thank you.
Sincerely, a fan.
author: Douche Bag

text: At the risk of sounding like an advert - I'm not - I thought I'd just say something. There's an incredibly excellent TV show called Haven. It stars Emily Rose A.K.A Elena Fisher. The only reason I started watching it was to see what Emily Rose was like outside of voice acting, but turns out, it's a fucking incredible TV show. It's at the risk of being cancelled after season 3 though. I implore you, fellow Unchated fans, to check out this show and help prevent it being cancelled.
